attributes.action: Increase vehicle and fuel tax even more to get people off the road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose a doubling if not tripling of tax on cars, lorry's etc and also fuel to get drivers off the road. I also suggest the extra revenue from this be funded into buying back national rail and making rail travel free to all to get people off the road and into trains, buses etc
